description:
Upward Mobility’s CLEP Chemistry Exam Prep for Palm webOS is a carefully constructed tool to help students prepare for the College Board's CLEP Chemistry exam. 


We recognize your time is valuable, so each question is structured to help you master an important area of knowledge for the test.  Each question is followed by a clear and insightful explanation, ensuring comprehensive understanding of the material.  This module contains 162 simulated exam questions addressing nearly all the topics commonly covered on the exam, including:
Structure of Matter
States of Matter
Reaction Types
Equations and Stoichiometry
Equilibrium
Kinetics


This module was written and edited by Patrick Shields and Ted Chan from MIT



About the CLEP Chemistry Exam

The CLEP Chemistry examination covers material that is usually taught in a one-year college course in general chemistry. During this examination, an online scientific calculator function and a periodic table are available as part of the testing software.  The College-Level Examination Program (CLEP) provides learners with an opportunity to receive college credit for their knowledge gained through self-study, prior course work, career, professional development, cultural pursuits, or internships.

The CLEP exam is administered by the College Board, which does not endorse this product, and was not involved in its production.



About Upward Mobility

Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  We hire only expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and put all of our materials through a thorough review process.

We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
